response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item holds immense value, not only in monetary terms but also in its unique features and capabilities. Given its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending to you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to reflect its true value while providing you with an attractive discount. I am confident that you will find this proposal compelling and hope to hear your positive response soon. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Sincerely, Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
